activities:
Kaplan Inc. manages, maintains and hosts data associated with centralized repositories for employee information, enabling more efficient management of human resource functions, including management of compensation and benefits and workforce skills, talent and performance data.  

Kaplan Inc.'s parent company receives and manages reports, including those submitted by employees concerning potential compliance and ethics violations within its organization.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
